column4: is there anything I should do to run windows programs on amd64 ubuntu?
you can use wine for some of them
yes, but a program is runing flawlessly on 32 bit ubuntu but does not even start for amd64 one..
if you had a sucessfull running system with 8.04, and now it's freezing with the same version, you are more likely to have an hw issue, did you run the memtesT ?
tried leaving running the memtest for quite some time but it did not find any problem
boot the live disk, check the disk name, with : sudo fdis -l, and then check for bad blocks with: sudo badblocks drive
I'll try that and let you know how it goes
I would really like to have ubuntu back on this machine - it's dad's computer and he got quite used to it :)
done running badblocks on all my ubuntu partitions (/ /home swap).. is there anything else I should try to run?
I have no idea on your problem :\
there are several utilites to find dup files in general
to find duplicated files you can use fdupes
but I was thinking something oriented on music, since you can have multiple files of the same song that are in different bitrate (thus different files) but they are the same song..
